text: The prime minister addressed the nation regarding new tax reforms.
India won the cricket world cup after a thrilling final match.
Researchers unveiled a new AI model that mimics human reasoning.
Parliament passes a historic environmental protection act.
Tesla unveils its latest electric vehicle model with advanced AI features.
Climate change report warns of rising sea levels and extreme weather.
The Lakers defeated the Celtics in a high-intensity NBA game.
Scientists successfully test a fusion reactor prototype.
The opposition leader criticized the latest government budget proposal.
Google announces a new Android update with better privacy features.
